parameters.name: Administrator
parameters.description: The administrator ID. Valid only for album types. Default: The current user ID.

parameters.name: CreateUser
parameters.description: The creator user ID. Valid only for album types. Default: The current user ID.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The collection description. Supports fuzzy matching.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The collection name. Supports fuzzy matching.

parameters.name: Order
parameters.description:
The sort order. Valid values:

*   Asc (default): Ascending order
*   Desc

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default: 10. Maximum: 100.

parameters.name: ParentId
parameters.description: The ID of the parent collection.

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description:
The sort field. Valid values:

*   Id (default)
*   Name
*   CreateUser: Creator ID
*   CreateTime: Creation time
*   ModifyTime: Modification time

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The collection type. Valid values:

*   Category
*   Album
*   AlbumCategory: Album subcategory
